parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of reports to generate. The following report types an be generated: License configuration report - Reports the number and details of consumed licenses for a license configuration. Resource report - Reports the tracked licenses and resource consumption for a license configuration. (string) ---

parameters.name: ReportContext
parameters.description: Defines the type of license configuration the report generator tracks. Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the license configuration that this generator reports on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: licenseConfigurationArns
nested_params.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the license configuration that this generator reports on.

parameters.name: ReportFrequency
parameters.description: Frequency by which reports are generated. Reports can be generated daily, monthly, or weekly. value (integer) --- Number of times within the frequency period that a report is generated. The only supported value is 1. period (string) --- Time period between each report. The period can be daily, weekly, or monthly.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: Number of times within the frequency period that a report is generated. The only supported value is 1.

nested_params.name: period
nested_params.description: Time period between each report. The period can be daily, weekly, or monthly.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Tags to add to the report generator. (dict) --- Details about a tag for a license configuration. Key (string) --- Tag key. Value (string) --- Tag value.

nested_items.name: LicenseManagerReportGeneratorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the new report generator.
